name: unsuitably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not acceptable or right for something or someone: She was deeply embarrassed to see her mother arriving in unsuitably colourful clothes. The horse was pulled out of the race due to unsuitably soft ground. See
unsuitable
More examplesFewer examplesHe was dressed unsuitably for the climate.You should minimize the possibility of contracting unsuitably qualified firms.The clients believed they were sold their product unsuitably.
